channel.title: Comments on: Is there really an alternative to Powerpoint?
channel.description: O brave new world that has such people in IT

item.title: By: Jeff
item.dc:creator: Jeff
item.description: We tend to use Keynote even for a <a href="http://www.thepowerpointagency.com" rel="nofollow">powerpoint slide design</a> request from clients. it's so much more efficient for creation don't you think? As a <a href="http://www.thepowerpointagency.com" rel="nofollow">powerpoint design company</a> we have to work with Powerpoint but we would gladly give it up for other media.
item.content:encoded: We tend to use Keynote even for a powerpoint slide design request from clients. it’s so much more efficient for creation don’t you think? As a powerpoint design company we have to work with Powerpoint but we would gladly give it up for other media.

item.title: By: Ian Lynch
item.dc:creator: Ian Lynch
item.description: If you want to share info. use Google docs http://bit.ly/L9WWHU or some other app that uses web pages. Update the presentation and everyone gets it. Build links to integrate the info. with your other info. Stop filling your hard drive with thousands of files you'll never ever find!
item.content:encoded: If you want to share info. use Google docs http://bit.ly/L9WWHU or some other app that uses web pages. Update the presentation and everyone gets it. Build links to integrate the info. with your other info. Stop filling your hard drive with thousands of files you’ll never ever find!
